page.title: 10A Sunday in My Life
page.content: At approximately 8.00am I get up, get dressed in Sunday clothes, depending on the season, and go down- stairs to have my breakfast-cereal or cooked breakfast or toast-then walk with Mum to Chapel. After Chapel I sometimes do a bit of gardening, or type, play with a friend, or take the dog for a walk. For lunch I usually have a snack. Then I occasionally play a board game with Dad. At 4 o'clock I go for a swimming lesson at Rushcliffe Leisure Centre. When I get home I wash my hair before I have Sunday dinner---roast beef, Yorkshire pudding, potatoes, carrots and cauliflower and gravy. My favourite pudding is fruit pie. Before I go to bed I watch television with Mum and Dad.
